6139.verse-arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
6139.verse-english: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

clauses-arabic.clause: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا

clauses-english.clause: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

6140.verse-english: And the earth discharges its burdens

clauses-english.clause: And the earth discharges its burdens

6141.verse-english: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -

6142.verse-english: That Day, it will report its news

6143.verse-english: Because your Lord has commanded it.

clauses-english.clause: Because your Lord has commanded it.

6144.verse-arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
6144.verse-english: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

clauses-english.clause: the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

6145.verse-arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
6145.verse-english: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

clauses-arabic.clause: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ

clauses-english.clause: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

6146.verse-arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
6146.verse-english: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

clauses-arabic.clause: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ

clauses-english.clause: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
